channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP User – Custom Registration Forms, Login and User Profile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP User – Custom Registration Forms, Login and User Profile

item.title: CVE-2021-25034|2024-08-03T19:49:14.550Z -- unknown -- wp%20user%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20forms%2C%20login%20and%20user%20profile
item.description: The WP User WordPress plugin before 7.0 does not sanitise and escape some parameters in pages where the [wp_user] shortcode is used, leading to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issues
